statements: SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE revenue > 10000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT id, revenue FROM financial_data WHERE expenses < 5000 ORDER BY expenses ASC;
SELECT id, revenue, expenses FROM financial_data WHERE revenue > expenses AND budget_allocations > 0;
SELECT id, expenses, budget_allocations FROM financial_data WHERE budget_allocations < expenses ORDER BY budget_allocations DESC;
SELECT id, revenue, expenses, budget_allocations FROM financial_data WHERE revenue < budget_allocations;
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, revenue, expenses FROM financial_data WHERE revenue > 10000
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE expenses < 5000 AND budget_allocations > 7000 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id, revenue, expenses, budget_allocations FROM financial_data WHERE revenue < expenses
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY budget_allocations DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM revenue;
SELECT id, amount, date, description FROM revenue WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT date, amount, description FROM revenue ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Utilities';
SELECT id, amount, category FROM expenses ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, amount, date, description FROM revenue WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, amount, date, description FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Office Supplies' ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT id, amount, date, description FROM revenue WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT id, amount, date, category FROM expenses WHERE amount < 500 AND category = 'Utilities' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id, amount, date, category FROM expenses WHERE date < '2022-05-01' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM revenue ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, amount FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT category, amount FROM budget_allocation WHERE category = 'Marketing';
SELECT * FROM revenue ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE description LIKE '%computer%';
SELECT id, amount, date FROM revenue ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id, amount, description FROM expenses WHERE description ILIKE '%office%'
SELECT id, category, amount FROM budget_allocation WHERE category='Marketing'
SELECT * FROM revenue INNER JOIN budget_allocation ON revenue.id = budget_allocation.id WHERE revenue.amount > budget_allocation.amount
SELECT id, amount, date FROM revenue ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT id, category, amount FROM budget_allocations WHERE year = 2022;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, amount, category, year FROM budget_allocations ORDER BY year ASC, amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM revenue;
SELECT amount, date FROM revenue ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT category, amount FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM revenue WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT financial_reports.report_date, revenue.amount, expenses.category FROM financial_reports JOIN revenue ON financial_reports.revenue_id = revenue.id JOIN expenses ON financial_reports.expenses_id = expenses.id WHERE revenue.amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM revenue ORDER BY amount DESC, date ASC
SELECT revenue_id, amount, date FROM revenue WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT category, expenses_amount FROM expenses WHERE date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT department, sum(amount) AS total_budget FROM budget_allocations GROUP BY department
SELECT report_name, revenue_amount, expenses_amount FROM financial_reports WHERE revenue_amount > expenses_amount
SELECT * FROM revenue;
SELECT date, amount FROM expenses WHERE category='Marketing';
SELECT report_name, revenue_amount, expenses_amount FROM financial_reports ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC;
SELECT department, SUM(amount) AS total_budget FROM budget_allocations GROUP BY department;
SELECT analysis_id, revenue_variance, expenses_variance, budget_variance FROM analysis_results WHERE revenue_variance > 0 OR expenses_variance < 0 ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
